item.description:
Lets go kayaking ! We'll paddle up the nice easy Merrimack river to a spot where we all feel comfortable and head back. Edgewater has many rentals at only $5/ hour. The river is wide and easy to move along. This is a good oppertunity to see if you like the sport. You can call ahead and reserve your boat. Sat looks to be nice and sunny. We paddle by the park in Pembroke if you want to stop and eat on the way back. There are grills and tables..

So lets have some fun on the water. bring your sunscreen, cameras ,water, snacks and smiles :)


Call if you have questions 315-0275
item.name: Kayking in Hooksett
